segment.source: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations
segment.target: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations

segment.source: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations
segment.target: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations

segment.source: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations
segment.target: Viewing MED-V Workspace Configurations

segment.source: When you are troubleshooting MED-V issues and problems, you can use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to view the published applications and redirected web addresses in the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: When you are troubleshooting MED-V issues and problems, you can use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to view the published applications and redirected web addresses in the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: You can also use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to open the MED-V workspace in full-screen mode.
segment.target: You can also use the MED-V Administration Toolkit to open the MED-V workspace in full-screen mode.

segment.source: For information about how to open the MED-V Administration Toolkit, see Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit.
segment.target: For information about how to open the MED-V Administration Toolkit, see Troubleshooting MED-V by Using the Administration Toolkit.

segment.source: Viewing MED-V Published Applications
segment.target: Viewing MED-V Published Applications

segment.source: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click View Published Applications.
segment.target: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click View Published Applications.

segment.source: The MED-V Workspace Published Applications window opens and displays a list of the applications that were published in the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: The MED-V Workspace Published Applications window opens and displays a list of the applications that were published in the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: You can use this information to troubleshoot certain issues, such as determining whether an application was published as expected.
segment.target: You can use this information to troubleshoot certain issues, such as determining whether an application was published as expected.

segment.source: For information about how to publish applications to the MED-V workspace, see How to Publish and Unpublish an Application on the MED-V Workspace.
segment.target: For information about how to publish applications to the MED-V workspace, see How to Publish and Unpublish an Application on the MED-V Workspace.

segment.source: Viewing MED-V Redirected Web Addresses
segment.target: Viewing MED-V Redirected Web Addresses

segment.source: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click View Redirected Web Addresses.
segment.target: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click View Redirected Web Addresses.

segment.source: The Web Addresses Redirected to the MED-V Workspace window opens and displays a list of the redirected web addresses specified for the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: The Web Addresses Redirected to the MED-V Workspace window opens and displays a list of the redirected web addresses specified for the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: You can use this information to troubleshoot certain issues, such as determining whether a web address was specified correctly for redirection.
segment.target: You can use this information to troubleshoot certain issues, such as determining whether a web address was specified correctly for redirection.

segment.source: For information about how to manage web addresses redirection in the MED-V workspace, see How to Add or Remove URL Redirection Information in a Deployed MED-V Workspace.
segment.target: For information about how to manage web addresses redirection in the MED-V workspace, see How to Add or Remove URL Redirection Information in a Deployed MED-V Workspace.

segment.source: Opening the MED-V Workspace Virtual Machine
segment.target: Opening the MED-V Workspace Virtual Machine

segment.source: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click View MED-V Workspace Full Screen.
segment.target: On the MED-V Administration Toolkit window, click View MED-V Workspace Full Screen.

segment.source: MED-V closes if it was running, and the MED-V workspace virtual machine opens in full-screen mode.
segment.target: MED-V closes if it was running, and the MED-V workspace virtual machine opens in full-screen mode.

segment.source: You can use this full-screen window to easily access all the components of the virtual machine that might be helpful in troubleshooting, such as its hard disk and settings files.
segment.target: You can use this full-screen window to easily access all the components of the virtual machine that might be helpful in troubleshooting, such as its hard disk and settings files.

segment.target: Related topics
